Description: DESCRIPTION
Preconditions: PRECONDITIONS
Steps: STEPS
Expected Result: EXPECTED RESULT

Test Case Name: Register with valid email and password
Description: User should be able to register with a valid email, password, and phone number
Preconditions: User is on registration page; Email is not already registered
Steps:
1. Enter valid email
2. Enter valid password
3. Enter phone number with country code
4. Select category
5. Agree to terms
6. Click Register
Expected Result: OTP verification dialog appears; User receives verification code

Description: User should be able to verify their email using OTP
Preconditions: User has registered and OTP dialog is open
Steps:
1. Enter received OTP code
2. Click Verify
3. Complete payment if required
Expected Result: Account created; User redirected to dashboard or payment page

Description: User should be able to request a new OTP if they didn't receive one
Preconditions: User is in OTP verification dialog
Steps:
1. Click 'Resend OTP'
2. Wait for new code
3. Enter new OTP
Expected Result: New OTP is sent; User can enter and verify new code

Test Case Name: Login with valid email and password
Description: User should be able to login with correct credentials
Preconditions: User has valid account; User is on login page
Steps:
1. Enter email
2. Enter password
3. Click Login
Expected Result: User is logged in; Redirected to dashboard or home page

Description: User should see error when entering wrong password
Preconditions: User is on login page
Steps:
1. Enter valid email
2. Enter incorrect password
3. Click Login
Expected Result: Error message displayed; User stays on login page

Description: User should be able to enable two-factor authentication
Preconditions: User is logged in; User is on account settings
Steps:
1. Navigate to security settings
2. Click 'Enable 2FA'
3. Scan QR code with authenticator app
4. Enter verification code
5. Save backup codes
Expected Result: 2FA is enabled; User must enter 2FA code on login

Description: User should be able to login when 2FA is enabled
Preconditions: User has 2FA enabled; User is on login page
Steps:
1. Enter email and password
2. Enter 2FA code from authenticator
3. Click Verify
Expected Result: User is logged in successfully

Description: User should be able to login using Google account
Preconditions: User has Google account; User is on login page
Steps:
1. Click 'Login with Google'
2. Authenticate with Google
3. Authorize KOSCOCO
Expected Result: User is logged in with Google account; Account is created if new

Description: User should be able to login using Facebook account
Preconditions: User has Facebook account; User is on login page
Steps:
1. Click 'Login with Facebook'
2. Authenticate with Facebook
3. Authorize KOSCOCO
Expected Result: User is logged in with Facebook account; Account is created if new

Description: User should be able to request a password reset email
Preconditions: User is on forgot password page; Email exists in system
Steps:
1. Enter registered email
2. Click 'Send Reset Link'
3. Check email for reset link
Expected Result: Reset email is sent; User can click link to reset password

Description: User should be able to set new password using reset token
Preconditions: User has clicked reset link; Reset token is valid
Steps:
1. Enter new password
2. Confirm password
3. Click 'Reset Password'
Expected Result: Password is updated; User can login with new password

Description: User should be able to upload a video file
Preconditions: User is logged in; User is on upload page
Steps:
1. Select video file (MP4, AVI, etc.)
2. Enter video title
3. Enter description
4. Select category
5. Click Upload
Expected Result: Video is uploaded; Progress bar shows completion; Video appears in user's videos

Description: User should be able to upload custom thumbnail with video
Preconditions: User is on upload page
Steps:
1. Select video file
2. Upload custom thumbnail image
3. Fill other details
4. Click Upload
Expected Result: Video and thumbnail are uploaded; Thumbnail appears on video card

Test Case Name: Upload video with invalid file type
Description: System should reject invalid file formats
Preconditions: User is on upload page
Steps:
1. Select invalid file type (PDF, text, etc.)
2. Try to upload
Expected Result: Error message; File is rejected

Description: User should see all their uploaded videos in dashboard
Preconditions: User is logged in; User has uploaded videos
Steps:
1. Go to Dashboard
2. Look for 'My Videos' section
Expected Result: All user's videos are displayed with thumbnails, titles, stats

Description: User should be able to delete their own video
Preconditions: User is logged in; User owns the video
Steps:
1. Navigate to video
2. Click delete button
3. Confirm deletion
Expected Result: Video is deleted; No longer appears in user's videos

Description: User should be able to schedule video for automatic publication
Preconditions: User has uploaded a video
Steps:
1. Open video edit page
2. Enable scheduling
3. Select future date and time
4. Click Save
Expected Result: Video is scheduled; Published at specified time

Description: User should see all available competition categories
Preconditions: User is on Categories page
Steps:
1. Navigate to Categories page
2. View category cards
Expected Result: All categories displayed with images, descriptions, video counts

Test Case Name: Click on category to view videos
Description: User should see all videos in a selected category
Preconditions: User is viewing categories
Steps:
1. Click on a category card
2. Wait for videos to load
Expected Result: Videos in category are displayed; Can filter by subcategory

Description: Video should play when user clicks play button
Preconditions: User is on video page; Video is uploaded and processed
Steps:
1. Click play button
2. Wait for video to load
3. Verify audio and video
Expected Result: Video plays smoothly; Audio is in sync

Description: User should be able to control video playback
Preconditions: Video is playing
Steps:
1. Test play/pause
2. Test volume control
3. Test seek/scrubbing
4. Test fullscreen
Expected Result: All controls work correctly; Video responds to user input

Description: User should see video title, description, creator info, and stats
Preconditions: User is on video page
Steps:
1. View video title
2. View description
3. View creator profile
4. View stats (views, likes, votes)
Expected Result: All information is displayed correctly and up-to-date

Description: Authenticated user should be able to like a video
Preconditions: User is logged in; User is on video page
Steps:
1. Click like button
2. Verify like count increases
Expected Result: Video is liked; Like count increases by 1; Button highlights

Description: User should be able to remove like from video
Preconditions: User has already liked a video
Steps:
1. Click like button again
2. Verify like count decreases
Expected Result: Like is removed; Like count decreases by 1; Button unhighlights

Description: User should be able to post a comment on a video
Preconditions: User is logged in; User is on video page
Steps:
1. Click comment section
2. Type comment
3. Click Post
Expected Result: Comment is posted; Appears in comment section; Comment count increases

Description: User should be able to delete their own comments
Preconditions: User has posted a comment
Steps:
1. Find own comment
2. Click delete button
3. Confirm deletion
Expected Result: Comment is deleted; Comment count decreases

Description: User should be able to vote for a video
Preconditions: User is authenticated; Competition is active; User has available votes
Steps:
1. Click vote button
2. Confirm vote
Expected Result: Vote is recorded; Vote count increases; Vote cannot be cast again

Description: User should be able to purchase more votes
Preconditions: User is logged in; Has payment method
Steps:
1. Click 'Buy Votes'
2. Select number of votes
3. Complete payment via Flutterwave
Expected Result: Votes are added to account; Vote count increases

Description: User should be able to follow another creator
Preconditions: User is logged in; User is on creator's profile
Steps:
1. Click follow button
2. Verify follow count increases
Expected Result: Creator is followed; Follower count increases; Button text changes to 'Following'

Description: User should be able to unfollow a creator
Preconditions: User has followed a creator
Steps:
1. Click 'Following' button
2. Verify follow count decreases
Expected Result: Creator is unfollowed; Follower count decreases

Description: User should be able to send a gift to a creator
Preconditions: User is logged in; User has balance or payment method
Steps:
1. Click Send Gift
2. Select gift
3. Complete payment
4. Send gift
Expected Result: Gift is sent; Creator receives gift; User balance decreases

Description: User should see their stats on dashboard
Preconditions: User is logged in
Steps:
1. Navigate to Dashboard
2. View statistics cards
Expected Result: Total videos, votes received, votes cast, and other stats are displayed

Description: User should be able to view their profile
Preconditions: User is logged in
Steps:
1. Navigate to Profile
2. View profile information
Expected Result: Username, email, profile photo, bio, and stats are displayed

Description: User should be able to edit their profile
Preconditions: User is on profile edit page
Steps:
1. Edit bio
2. Upload profile photo
3. Update other info
4. Click Save
Expected Result: Profile is updated; Changes are reflected everywhere

Description: User should see which competitions they're registered for
Preconditions: User is logged in; User has registered for competitions
Steps:
1. Go to Dashboard
2. View Registrations section
Expected Result: All registered categories are listed with status

Description: Admin should see overall platform statistics
Preconditions: User is admin; User is on admin dashboard
Steps: 1. View dashboard overview
Expected Result: Key metrics displayed: users, videos, revenue, registrations

Description: Admin should be able to see list of all users
Preconditions: User is admin
Steps:
1. Navigate to Users tab
2. View user list
Expected Result: All users are displayed with email, status, role

Description: Admin should be able to change user roles
Preconditions: Admin is viewing users
Steps:
1. Click on user
2. Change role (judge, moderator, etc.)
3. Save
Expected Result: User role is updated; User has new permissions

Description: Admin should be able to suspend a user account
Preconditions: Admin is viewing users
Steps:
1. Click on user
2. Click Suspend
3. Confirm
Expected Result: User account is suspended; User cannot login

Description: Admin should see videos pending moderation
Preconditions: Admin is on moderation page
Steps: 1. View pending videos tab
Expected Result: Unreviewed videos are displayed

Description: Admin should be able to approve a video
Preconditions: Admin is viewing pending video
Steps:
1. Click Approve
2. Add optional comment
3. Confirm
Expected Result: Video is approved; Becomes visible to all users

Description: Admin should be able to reject a video with reason
Preconditions: Admin is viewing pending video
Steps:
1. Click Reject
2. Enter rejection reason
3. Confirm
Expected Result: Video is rejected; Creator is notified

Description: Admin should see all competition phases
Preconditions: Admin is on phase management page
Steps: 1. View phases list
Expected Result: All phases displayed with dates and status

Description: Admin should be able to activate a phase
Preconditions: Admin is viewing phases
Steps:
1. Click on phase
2. Click Activate
3. Confirm
Expected Result: Phase is activated; Users can register for this phase

Description: Admin should see all pending payout requests
Preconditions: Admin is on payouts page
Steps: 1. View pending payouts
Expected Result: All payout requests displayed with amount and user

Description: Admin should be able to approve a payout
Preconditions: Admin is viewing payout requests
Steps:
1. Click on payout
2. Click Approve
3. Confirm
Expected Result: Payout is processed; User is paid

Description: Admin should see all reports (violations, inappropriate content, etc.)
Preconditions: Admin is on reports page
Steps: 1. View reports list
Expected Result: All reports displayed with type, user, and details

Description: Admin should be able to review and resolve a report
Preconditions: Admin is viewing reports
Steps:
1. Click on report
2. Review details
3. Take action (warn, suspend, delete)
4. Mark as resolved
Expected Result: Report is marked resolved; Action is taken on user/content

Description: Judge should see their scoring dashboard
Preconditions: User is a judge; User is logged in
Steps: 1. Navigate to Judge Dashboard
Expected Result: Dashboard shows pending videos and completed scores

Description: Judge should be able to rate and score a video
Preconditions: Judge is viewing pending video
Steps:
1. Watch video
2. Enter score/rating
3. Add notes (optional)
4. Submit score
Expected Result: Score is recorded; Video moves to completed list

Description: Users should be able to see judge information on public profile
Preconditions: User is viewing judge list or video
Steps:
1. Click on judge name
2. View judge profile
Expected Result: Judge name, bio, and credentials are displayed

Description: Creator should see their account balance
Preconditions: User is logged in; User is a creator
Steps:
1. Navigate to Wallet
2. View balance
Expected Result: Current balance is displayed; Transaction history shown

Description: Creator should be able to request withdrawal of balance
Preconditions: Creator has available balance
Steps:
1. Click 'Request Payout'
2. Enter amount
3. Select payment method
4. Confirm
Expected Result: Payout request is created; Appears in admin's payout list

Description: User should see affiliate program details and commission rates
Preconditions: User is on affiliate page
Steps:
1. Navigate to Affiliate page
2. View program details
Expected Result: Commission structure and benefits are clearly displayed

Description: Affiliate should be able to generate unique referral link
Preconditions: User is an affiliate; User is on affiliate dashboard
Steps:
1. Click 'Generate Link'
2. Copy referral link
3. Share with others
Expected Result: Unique referral link is generated; Tracked in dashboard

Description: Advertiser should be able to signup and get approved
Preconditions: User is on advertiser signup page
Steps:
1. Fill advertiser information
2. Submit application
3. Wait for admin approval
Expected Result: Application submitted; User receives email when approved

Description: Advertiser should be able to create ad campaign
Preconditions: Advertiser account is approved
Steps:
1. Click 'Create Campaign'
2. Enter campaign details
3. Set budget and duration
4. Submit
Expected Result: Campaign is created and goes live after approval

Description: User should be able to switch to French language
Preconditions: User is on any page
Steps:
1. Click language selector
2. Select 'French'
3. Verify content changes
Expected Result: All content is displayed in French

Description: User should be able to switch to English language
Preconditions: User is viewing content in French
Steps:
1. Click language selector
2. Select 'English'
3. Verify content changes
Expected Result: All content is displayed in English

Description: User should be able to switch to dark theme
Preconditions: User is on any page
Steps:
1. Click theme toggle
2. Verify dark mode is applied
3. Reload page
4. Verify dark mode persists
Expected Result: Dark mode is applied and preference is saved

Description: User should see competition leaderboard
Preconditions: User is on leaderboard page
Steps:
1. View leaderboard
2. Check rankings and stats
Expected Result: Top creators are listed with vote counts and rankings

Description: User should be able to search for videos
Preconditions: User is on home or search page
Steps:
1. Enter search term
2. Press Enter
3. View results
Expected Result: Matching videos are displayed

Description: User should see notification bell with unread count
Preconditions: User is logged in; User has notifications
Steps:
1. Click notification bell
2. View notification list
Expected Result: Unread notifications are displayed with types and messages

Description: User should verify email with code from email
Preconditions: User has signed up
Steps:
1. Check email for verification link
2. Click link or enter code
3. Verify email
Expected Result: Email is verified; User can access full account

Description: Home page should load within acceptable time
Preconditions: User is on home page
Steps:
1. Open home page
2. Measure load time
3. Verify content renders
Expected Result: Page loads in under 3 seconds; Content is fully visible

Description: App should work well on mobile devices
Preconditions: User is on mobile device or using mobile emulation
Steps:
1. Test on mobile
2. Check layout
3. Test interactions
Expected Result: Layout is responsive; All features work on mobile

Description: User should see helpful 404 page when accessing non-existent page
Preconditions: User navigates to invalid URL
Steps:
1. Enter invalid URL
2. Verify 404 page appears
3. Check for navigation links
Expected Result: 404 page displays with navigation options
